activities: Plum transmits data over phone lines to an end user's (customer) back end database.  No data is collected or stored by PlumVoice.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Romania, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
Plum has appointed a Chief Privacy Officer. Should you believe your data has been used in a way not consistent with this policy or your stated preferences, or
should you have further questions related to this policy, please contact the Chief Privacy Officer by email at privacy_ww@plumvoice.com. Written inquiries may
be addressed to Chief Privacy Officer, The Plum Group, 131 Varick Street 9th
Floor, New York, NY 10103, United States of America.

We use TRUSTe for third party dispute resolution.
